column4: Anybody know if there are .debs for xloadtime? Or a way of fixing the .rpm or source for x86_64?
Hey. In what situations would .Xdefaults not be loaded? Because it doesnt load in my computer, not even if I put xrdb -load ~/.Xdefaults in my .xinitrc
I don't even have a ~/.Xdefaults file, try putting it in ~/.gnomerc
